channel.title: 24/7 server help!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, so i am nearing the release of my 508 server. but i have realised that not many people are going to want to play my server if it isnt 24/7. So i really need help with that. Also if somone could easily how to get a webclient on my own website that would be great.
Also i cant get my no-ip to work. I have an ip-changer client. I have a no-ip, the only way people can get onto my server is hamachi which really sucks..
Also if you have teamview that would be soooo much easier :) my username is 357 152 302 and password is 5260
Thanks alot, ~ Crunch ~

item.title: 24/7 server help!
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

Sounds like you need to port forward… Depending on your router/isp, it can be pretty easy.

Read full topic

item.title: 24/7 server help!
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

open a port and run it 24/7?

item.title: 24/7 server help!

Hello everyone,
so i am nearing the release of my 508 server. but i have realised that not many people are going to want to play my server if it isnt 24/7. So i really need help with that. Also if somone could easily how to get a webclient on my own website that would be great.
